content: See file and folder details here

comment.text: This translation key is used for a generic text that displays when no file or folder information is available in a UI component. The text is displayed below an image and provides a brief instruction to view file details. It appears in the "NoItem" component on the Home page of the client application.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Vizualizarea detaliilor despre fișiere și foldere' is a literal translation of 'See file and folder details here.' It is grammatically correct but sounds unnatural in Romanian. A more natural translation would convey the meaning of 'where you can see the details'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vezi detaliile fișierelor și folderele aici

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Здесь будут представлены свойства файлов и папок' is a literal translation that doesn't quite capture the intended meaning of 'See file and folder details here'. It's more formal and less inviting than the original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more user-friendly translation like 'Здесь отображаются сведения о файлах и папках' or 'Здесь можно увидеть сведения о файлах и папках'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "ගොනු සහ බහාලුම්වල විස්තර මෙතැන බලන්න" while understandable, isn't the most natural phrasing for the intended meaning of "See file and folder details here". A more accurate and natural translation would focus on encouraging the user to view the details.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පහත ගොනු හා ෆෝල්ඩර් විස්තර බලන්න (Pahatha gonu ha folder visarama balanna)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'See file and folder details here' is more conversational than the Slovenian translation. 'Tukaj si oglejte podrobnosti o datotekah in mapah' is a literal translation, but lacks the inviting tone of the English. A better translation would convey a similar level of friendliness.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Oglejte si podrobnosti o datotekah in mapah tukaj' or 'Poglejte si podrobnosti o datotekah in mapah.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Види детаље датотеке и фолдера овде' is a literal translation but doesn't flow naturally in Serbian. A more idiomatic translation would better convey the meaning of 'See file and folder details here'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Погледајте детаље датотека и фолдера овде

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Vidi detalje datoteke i foldera ovde' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "See file and folder details here." 'Vidi' is the imperfect tense of 'videti' (to see), implying a continuous action, while the English text is a directive or instruction. A more appropriate translation would use a more directive verb.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pogledaj detalje datoteke i foldera ovde
